Package net.silthus.schat.pointer

Interface Pointers

All Known Subinterfaces:
Settings
public sealed interface Pointers permits Settings (not exhaustive)
A collection of pointers.

    • pointers

      @NotNull default <V> @NotNull @Unmodifiable Set<Pointer<V>> pointers(@NotNull @NotNull Class<V> valueType)
      Gets all pointer in this collection which have the given value type.
      Type Parameters:
      V - the type of the pointer
      Parameters:
      valueType - the type class of the pointer
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable set of pointers filtered by the given type
      Since:
      next

    • pointers

      @NotNull default @NotNull @Unmodifiable Set<Pointer<?>> pointers()
      Gets all pointer in this pointer collection.

      Implementation Notice

      Override this method on custom pointers implementations and return an unfiltered set of pointers in this collection.

      Returns:
      an unmodifiable set of pointers in this pointer collection
      Since:
      next

      @Contract("_, null -> _; _, !null -> !null") @Nullable default <T> T getOrDefault(@NotNull @NotNull Pointer<T> pointer, @Nullable T defaultValue)
      Gets the value of pointer.

      If a value for pointer is unable to be provided, defaultValue will be returned.

      Gets the value of pointer.

      If a value for pointer is unable to be provided, the value supplied by defaultValue will be returned.

    • contains

      <T> boolean contains(@NotNull @NotNull Pointer<T> pointer)
      Checks if a given pointer is supported.

      This will return true when a mapping for the provided pointer exists, even if the value for the pointer is null.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type
      Parameters:
      pointer - the pointer
      Returns:
      if the pointer is supported
      Since:
      next
